title: Gold Personalized Necklace for Emma

description: Made a great gift! Matched the description exactly. Very well made and packaged. Would definitely recommend :)

title: Gold Personalized Necklace
name: Charlie
description: Brought it as a birthday gift, as very pleased with it and hope it will be well received. Excellent value for money and delivered promptly

title: 925 Sterling Silver Necklace
name: Emma
description: I ordered a custom necklace and the comms were great, and I can’t wait to wear my beautiful jewellery!

title: Gold Personalized Ring for Wesley
name: Wesley
description: I had a special request, which was handled very well. Customer contact went smoothly and without me having placed the order, they sent me an example via WhatsApp so that I could see what it could look like. Very happy with the result!

title: Personalized Cufflinks
name: Anthony Edward Ancell
description: Item arrived on time and as shown in the photo, the seller's availability is truly top notch... I will definitely buy more

title: Personalized Necklace for Dayana
name: Dayana Dimitrova
description: Quick despatch time. Very helpful seller. The item itself is amazing. I bought a necklace for myself and now 2+ years later still haven’t changed or broke therefore I decided to order one for my mum and best friend. So happy with the final products + bonus they arrived in lovely little boxes. Will definitely use again !!
